casebody.data:
STATE of Louisiana
v.
Furnell SEVERIN, Jr. NO. 2018-KH-1658 Supreme Court of Louisiana. May 28, 2019

*315Denied. Applicant has previously exhausted his right to state collateral review and fails to show that any exception permits his successive filing. See State ex rel. Severin v. State, 18-0041 (La. 9/14/18), 252 So.3d 466.
